#include<stdio.h>
typedef unsigned long long LL;

LL gcd(LL a,LL b){
	LL r=a%b;
	if(r==0) return b;
	return gcd(b,r);
}

void read(LL *n){
	*n=0;
	char ch=getchar();
	int ve=1;
	while(ch<'0'||ch>'9'){if(ch=='-') ve*=-1;ch=getchar();}
	while(ch>='0'&&ch<='9'){
		*n=(*n)*10+ch-'0';
		ch=getchar();
	}
	(*n)*=ve;
}

/*inline int pow2(LL n){
	while(1){
		if(n%2==0) n=n/2;
		else break;
	}
	if(n==1) return 1;
	return 0;
}*/
int main(){
	LL T,p,q,r,hcf;
	LL b_4=2*2*2*2,b_16,b_62;
	b_16=b_4*b_4*b_4*b_4;
	b_62=(b_16/2)*(b_16/2)*b_16*b_16;
	read(&T);
	while(T--){
		read(&p);read(&q);
		if(p>q) hcf=gcd(p,q);
		else hcf=gcd(q,p);
		p=p/hcf;q=q/hcf;
		r=q/gcd(b_62,q);
		if((r&(r+1))||p>(q+1)||(p&(p-1))){
			puts("NO");
		}else{
			puts("YES");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
